==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|さん|もん|はん|k3=ばん|yomi=on}}

===Etymology===
Literally a three ''[[w:Japanese mon (currency)|mon]]'' seal. A ''mon'' is a historical Japanese currency worth very little similar to a shilling or penny. -''ban'' is the [[w:Rendaku|voiced]] form of {{m|ja|判|tr=han}} and equivalent to {{m|ja|判子|tr=hanko||seal}}.

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|さんもんばん}}
# a cheap [[seal]]
